NEW MINIPRESS® Capsules 1mg, 2mg, 5mg.

Dear Mansour,

As-salaam aleikum!

Just finished a mornings work at the Khankak office in Novate ——where I now work every Friday morning, Now I am at dialysis in Greenwood (pardon the stationery.)

We are drafting final statements on a number of subjects for the “Organizational” issue of Birmingham due out in a a month or so, inshahallah.

I went into the Khankak Chapel to practice Tassawurri Marshid, as a preparation for writing a statement on the “Silyla Sufian.” This surprised I was when it was your being I attended to instead of your being the sphere.

The entire heart-felt & yearning spirit of sonship to Marshid came through through with such beauty & force of of feeling that I accepted it without question as a direct transmission from from the sphere.

It helped me considerably to finalize the statement at hand.

Al hamad lilillah!
